sys_documentation.label: *** Do any relatives work for the agency you are submitting this form?

sys_documentation.hint: Include: father, mother, husband, wife, son, daughter, brother, sister, uncle, aunt, first cousin, nephew, niece, father-in-law,mother-in-law, son-in-law, daughter-in-law, brother-in-law, sister-in-law, stepfather, stepmother, stepson, stepdaughter, stepbrother, stepsister, half brother, and half sister. If "YES," use the last box to provide the relative's name, relationship, and the department, agency, or branch of the Armed Forces for which your relative works.
